title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. Fry the pancetta until crispy. Beat eggs with Parmesan. Toss everything together with the pasta. Serve immediately.
